document.full_text: the miami heat completed their regular season with a confident 97-79 win over the toronto raptors on wednesday, the star-studded lineup now able to shift their focus to a tilt at the nba championship.
document.title: miami ready to turn up heat in bid for championship
lines_and_colors: the miami heat completed their regular season with a confident 97-79 win over the toronto raptors on wednesday, the star-studded lineup now able to shift their focus to a tilt at the nba championship.
